body: Yes, I agree that creating dim copies is a waste. So I wasn't able to find an easy way to get around this with existing APIs. I can implement something similar to what I using for CUDA kernel and only keep one copy, does this sound good?
body_html: Yes, I agree that creating dim copies is a waste. So I wasn't able to find an easy way to get around this with existing APIs. I can implement something similar to what I using for CUDA kernel and only keep one copy, does this sound good?
